data.actual_result: Sometimes it doesn't send and you need to leave / rejoin the discord to make them send
data.short_description: Image / Screenshots don't send with iCloud Photo Library enabled.
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable iCloud Photo Library. If already Enabled, disable and then reenable it.- Take a screenshot or find a picture in your camera roll - Try to send it to a DM or to a server (This bug  doesn't work 100% of the times)
